item.title: Burning Dead Reloaded
item.description:
About This Game

Background:
La Montaña, once a hub of scientific excellence, has transformed into a nightmare landscape following a catastrophic failure at the "CRISPR Advance Research Center" (CARC). Accused of orchestrating this disaster, Mike Pacheco is driven by two goals: saving his daughter from the heart of chaos and revealing the true architects behind the calamity.

Part 1 - The Descent:
As Mike Pacheco, players will venture into the eerie, zombie-infested corridors of La Montaña. The unfolding narrative reveals a tale of corporate irresponsibility and betrayal, setting the stage for an intense journey of survival, truth-seeking, and paternal responsibility.

Part 2 - Burning Dead Reloaded:
The gameplay intensifies across +30 thrilling levels. Each stage presents unique challenges, ranging from stealth missions in devastated labs to intense shootouts against a variety of Crispers and mutated creatures.

Game Objectives:
Father's Mission: Central to the game is Mike's desperate search for his daughter, proving her innocence in the process.
Survival Combat: Engage in combat against a range of Crispers and genetically altered beasts with a diverse arsenal of weapons that includes shotguns, pistols, assault rifles and even grenades.
Unravel the Conspiracy: Collect evidence to expose the conspiracy behind the outbreak and redeem Mike's reputation.
Strategic Navigation: Skillfully navigate through the dangerous environments of La Montaña, balancing stealth and combat through huge storms and forest fires.
Climactic Confrontation: Confront and bring to justice those responsible, securing a safe future for Mike and his daughter.

Game Features:
Emotionally Charged Storyline: A narrative blending action, survival, and a father’s relentless quest to save his daughter.
Diverse Gameplay Mechanics: A mix of shooting, stealth, and puzzle-solving.
Expansive Arsenal: An array of weapons to combat different enemy types.
Dynamic Environments: Explore the intricately designed labs and containment areas of La Montaña.
Character Evolution: Witness Mike Pacheco's transformation from a security chief to a determined father on a mission.

In "Burning Dead Reloaded," players are invited into a world where personal stakes are high and danger lurks around every corner. Can you navigate the horrors of La Montaña, rescue your daughter, and restore your tarnished name?

item.title: VERUM
item.description:
About This Game

Introducing VERUM - an interactive experience that will challenge the way you see the world. This game goes beyond just entertainment and invites players to explore important ethical issues surrounding giant tech corporations and the usage of personal data by companies and governments.

Through VERUM's gameplay, you will embark on a journey to understand the story behind the game. As you progress, you will encounter multiple side stories that cover different aspects of the main plot and present different perspectives. By seeing the same plot through these different lenses, you will gain a more diverse understanding of the topics presented.

Each side story consists of a series of scenes followed by unique endings, providing valuable information for players to understand the main plot. The best part? The player can visualize these endings in any order without respecting their chronological timeline.

As the player traverses through unique scenes related to side stories, they will unlock one of VERUM's multiple endings. The game always starts (restarts) at the same initial scene, and the player can jump between side stories to reach different endings.

VERUM's gameplay is simple yet immersive. Players must find a gate to move from one scene to another, and interaction with these gates is as simple as a click or click and hold. The narrative of each scene gives a clue to what that specific scene represents and indicates what can be a gate there.

With its beautiful and captivating graphics, VERUM is an experience like no other. It challenges players to question their own beliefs and to look at the same topic from different perspectives. There are no right or wrong answers, only valuable insights that will leave you thinking long after the game is over.

Are you ready to challenge your beliefs and explore the world of VERUM? Get ready to dive into this thought-provoking experience and unlock multiple endings to uncover the full story.

item.title: Nothing Together
item.description:
About This Game

The hardest game you're ever going to play together. Maybe.

Just do Nothing as the timer goes up and climb the leaderboards. If you do Something, you lose.

Play in Together mode, where up to 20 players unite to do Nothing, or compete with other players in Battle Royale to find out who's the best at doing Nothing!

item.title: Reincarnation Tower
item.description:
About This Game

Reincarnation Tower is a challenging 2D platform. To aim for the top, sometimes you need patience and sometimes mental strength. One mistake can ruin your efforts, but you will have learned a lot.

・GamePlay

The operation is simple. the vertical and horizontal height of the jump is determined by the length of the input.
Also, after the jump, there's no choice but to watch over.

・Reincarnation

It is a system in which playable characters are unlocked according to your achievements.
New characters will bring you different experiences.

item.title: Russian Hut Simulator
item.description:
About This Game

This game is basically a classic walking simulator. All you have to do is to explore detailed recreated rooms of an old Russian hut and admire the beauty of its interior. The interior of the house is worked out to the smallest detail, so you can immerse yourself in the atmosphere of free village life, away from the gloomy high-rise buildings, the noise of cars and endless city bustle.

Game Features


  • Realistic graphics and meditative music
  • Choice of location and time of day
  • Atmosphere of village life
  • Endless replayability

item.title: Memary: Memory of the nameless one
item.description:
About This Game

MeMary : Memories Of the Nameless One


Introduction
Second project of Astralseal.
MeMary is a mystery visual novel with puzzles. This game has multiple ending depend on player ability to solved question and choice that player choose.


story
You who have no memory find yourself in the nameless mansion.
You don’t remember the reason why you stray in this mansion. You have no destination until you meet mysterious cat that reside in this mansion.

“I will guide you to your memory”

The mysterious cat offer help to guide you. The room with puzzle awaits you and when you solve it, you will regain your memory. To reclaim your identity, you choose to follow mysterious cat and solve all puzzle in the rooms of question.
What await you in your destination is the truth.
The unbearable truth about yourself that will never change.

Main Character

item.title: DON'T FACE UP
item.description:
About This Game

DON'T FACE UP is a first-person horror game.

Story


You wake up in a building you don't recognize.
No, you can't remember who you are, let alone the building.
You have lost your memory.

The words "DON'T FACE UP" are left at your feet.
Unsure of what it means, you proceed to explore the building.
You will have to find out what happened to you and what happened to this place.

Rule


They will appear at your side.
Never make eye contact with them.
They may appear and disappear. They may be standing in the direction you suddenly turn your eyes.
Even in such a situation, you must proceed with your search for the building.
Therefore, "DON'T FACE UP."

item.title: Kevin(1997-2077)
item.description:
About This Game

What can you expect in this game?

Reading!

Yes, only read.


Kevin(1997-2077) is a wander and wonder game. Roam through expansive landscapes using your keyboard to navigate and capture your experiences with your mouse. Encounter a multitude of friends, some authentic and others deceptive, each contributing to the enigmatic story of Kevin. Dive deep into his most profound and intimate emotions, unlocking a narrative that unveils his true self, discernible by exploring the depths of his heart. All of this, however, is accessible only if you possess the ability to read.

  • Meet 200+ friends from all around the world.
  • Delve into Kevin's deepest thoughts in the darkness.
  • Listen as Kevin counts numbers from 1 to 29200.
  • Unlimited read and write.
  • Colorful tutorial.
  • A conclusion awaits.


Wanna see an example? Here is a private note for you:










Chat on Discord!

item.title: 99 Waves
item.description:
About This Game


give us your feedback!

Break through the WAVES of enemies!




99 waves is an action platformer rogue-lite where you get stronger with your choices as you blast through waves.

During over a year of development, we have been focused on combining "hack'n'slash", "rogue-lite", and "platformer"!

10+ Bosses!




This is also a very exciting boss raid game!

Unique bosses with a variety of patterns await you!

Unlock new heroes!




Not only do the heroes you unlock have different stats, but they also have unique abilities!

Many ways to get stronger




You don't just get stronger when you level up - you get rewards at the end of the wave, you can buy cool items in the store, and you can even gain/enhance skills by defeating special enemies!

Automate/Awaken your skills




Once a skill reaches its maximum level, you can automate or awaken it, which means you can wipe out even more enemies!

Item Gacha and the Slot Machine!




Get some good weapons from the weapon gacha, and start stronger! Legendary weapons have a unique skill available!

There are many npcs in the town, like a bartender, a gravekeeper and a blacksmith!

And maybe playing the slot machine will give you good stuff for cheap, but be careful, it explodes if you're unlucky!


➡️➡️➡️ Wishlist please!!!! ⬅️⬅️⬅️
...and thanks for reading this far!!

item.title: Dump The Corpse
item.description:
About This Game


It's a puzzle game, an action game, and a dark humour game that mixes a lot of gameplay. The game focuses on a housewife who is oppressed by life, since she married a husband who can't make money, her life is incredibly bad, so she can make the choice to kill him, however, disposing of the body is a hassle, and she always reveals herself, bringing a lot of unnecessary trouble. All the code and resources of this game are open source, if you need them, you can find them in the root directory of the game.

item.title: GhostHunt With Triggered Insaan
item.description:
About This Game

A Horror Game Featuring Triggered Insaan (Nischay Malhan) as a Ghost Hunter. Explore the Environment, Find the Ghost, and Defeat Him to Escape.

Join Triggered Insaan in his new apartment for a heart-pounding horror game! Strange things start happening, and you must help him escape using ghost-hunting tools like the EMF reader and spirit box. Investigate, solve puzzles, and survive the paranormal. Can you unravel the mystery and make it out alive?

Be careful in Triggered Insaan's spooky apartment—there's a ghost around. Outsmart it to stay safe in this spooky adventure!

Ghost Hunting Tools -
• EMF Reader
• Spirit Box
• Summoning Circle
and more...

Features -
• High Graphics
• With Leaderboard
• Various Tools for Ghost Detection
• Emotes

Game Mode
• Easy - 5 lives but unranked
• Hard - 1 life and Ranked

item.title: Binding of Elements
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to a world full of monsters and dangers! In this exciting game you'll have to confront waves of monsters and face impressive bosses. To overcome these challenges, you'll be able to combine different elements to get powerful abilities. Experiment with different combinations to perfect your game style.

But that's not all! After each survived round, you'll have the possibility to choose from different upgrades to improve your character and strengthen your abilities.

The further you advance, the harder the battles will be and the more you'll have to improve your skills and strategy to survive.

Are you ready to face these challenges? Then grab your weapon and jump into the battle!

Features
- Combination of 36 skills
- Fast runs (approx. 30 minutes)
- Over 100 different upgrades
- Different perks for more specific play styles
- Elite rounds
- Talent tree for the different elements
- Different monsters with up to 3 abilities
- Different bosses with at least 5 abilities

item.title: Toward Pianist
item.description:
About This Game

If you have never been able to play the piano due to difficulty,
I recommend this game. It is a game that allows you to easily play the piano using the keyboard.

[10 + Classic Music Include]

[import Midi Files and Play the Songs You Want]

[This game provides an editor function. Modify it to your desired pattern]

[you Can Choose Any Background You Want]

item.title: 12 Labours of Hercules XVI: Olympic Bugs
item.description:
About This Game



Olympian gods sought to simplify human lives by creating sentient machines to assist them in their tasks. Initially, all ran smoothly: the mechanical aides quickly learned and tirelessly worked for the betterment of humanity. However, one fateful day, chaos erupted. Explosions echoed from Hephaestus’ forge, triggering a rebellion among the machines!



Now, humanity's last hope rests on Hercules, embarking on a quest to uncover the cause, pacify the rogue machines, and neutralize the impending threat. His journey traverses treacherous terrains, from towering mountains to perilous locations infested with hostile mechanisms, leading to the brain of Artificial Intelligence. Will the hero's strength be enough to vanquish this malevolent genius? Nevertheless, Hercules is determined to stand firm against the machines fighting for humankind!



Join forces with the hero on an enthralling odyssey, delve into the depths of AI's mind, catch the bugs, and confront a myriad of unexpected challenges. Embark on this captivating journey right now! Play “12 Labours of Hercules XVI: Olympic Bugs”!



  • Discover a new Game Speed setting with Hercules by your side!
  • Explore sublevels, bonus levels, super bonus levels and extra super-bonus levels!
  • Join Hercules in a thrilling quest, delve into AI's secrets!
  • Juggle tasks, catch bugs, and save mankind!
  • Interactive guide
  • Wallpapers
  • Additional bonus levels
  • Fascinating journey to Elysium

item.title: 荣光的见证 Glory's Witness
item.description:
About This Game

Disclaimer

Overview

In this apocalypse, the artificial intelligence robot you play will encounter various organs and monsters, use the guns in your hand to defeat the powerful bosses, experience many challenges and finally come to the front of the "god", with strength Witness the greatness of human civilization.

Game Features

Platform jumping, shooting through levels


Random cards with additional attributes


Boss battle, terrain challenge

item.title: Team Disorder
item.description:
About This Game

Team Disorder is an open-world game that can be played in FP or TP modes. Our game includes 4 large Open World Maps. In this game, you will find Large Beaches, picturesque Villages, and Urban/Regular Jungles. Most buildings are enterable with multiple floors up to eight!
The story begins with our main Character Jack being shot down on a strange planet by enemy aliens. He did enjoy a safe ejection from his "Borrowed Spaceship". Upon landing, he can not help but notice the planet strongly resembles Earth. On this planet, he must engage with the very worst sort of villains. His skills will be tested with all kinds of unfriendly fire types such as Ranged fire, Melee, and magic-throwing attacks. It's a good thing he has plenty of advanced weaponry with an old-fashioned twist to recover. This game offers maps that are distinctly different and have many secret areas. With hundreds of advanced AI enemies per level, you will need to bring your best game.
Team Disorder offers level a selection feature with a manual save system. You may advance to the next level by either completing or finding & unlocking glowing spheres. Magic books tell riddles that will lead you to massive secret levels! Join Team Disorder only When you are entirely ready for total DISORDER!







This Game Contains Creative Commons Attributes. Visit the website for a full list of credits.

item.title: Persona 3 Reload
item.description:
About This Game

Step into the shoes of a transfer student thrust into an unexpected fate when entering the hour "hidden" between one day and the next. Awaken an incredible power and chase the mysteries of the Dark Hour, fight for your friends, and leave a mark on their memories forever.

Persona 3 Reload is a captivating reimagining of the genre-defining RPG, reborn for the modern era.

Key Features:
- Experience the pivotal game of the Persona series faithfully remade with cutting-edge graphics, modernized quality-of-life features, and signature stylish UI.

-Fully immerse yourself in an emotional, gripping journey with new scenes, character interactions, and additional voiceover.

- Choose how to meaningfully spend each day through various activities, from exploring the Port Island to forging genuine bonds with beloved characters.

- Build and command your optimal team to take down otherworldly Shadows and climb closer to the truth.

---

Persona 3 Reload Digital Deluxe Edition includes:

  • Base Game
  • Digital Artbook: Filled with 64 pages of character art, concept art, backgrounds and other illustrations from the game!
  • Digital Soundtrack: Listen to newly arranged tracks from the original Persona 3 plus all-new tracks from Persona 3 Reload, presented by the Atlus sound team for a total of 60 new songs.

---

Persona 3 Reload Digital Premium Edition includes:

  • Base Game
  • Digital Artbook
  • Digital Soundtrack
  • Persona 3 Reload DLC Pack: P5R Phantom Thieves Costume Set, P5R Shujin Academy Costume Set, P5R Persona Set 1, P5R Persona Set 2 , P5R BGM Set, P4G Yasogami High Costume Set, P4G Persona Set

item.title: The Argument Solver
item.description:
About This Game

The Argument Solver allows you to quickly solver your issues between 2 Parties in a very primate way.

Easily create a lobby and be placed into our courtroom inspired Arena, where you can throw weapons at each other. Make sure you have a evasive defense as you only have 1 life.

The Argument Solver is perfect for all kinds of head to head debates, below we have list a couple of our favorites:
- Can't decide between which MOBA to play
- Help your partner decide where to eat by fighting over 2 options
- Crippling debt from a long custody battle or watch your parents duke it out for your ownership

item.title: Death's Toll
item.description:
About This Game

PLAY SOLO OR CO-OP as you journey across the world with a deadly beast always right on your tail! Search for supplies, make tough choices, meet a bunch of weirdos, and fight off hordes of monsters in a randomly generated quest for survival!

A thrilling, difficult, roguelite, roadtrip adventure.

Deaths Toll takes you on a randomly-generated journey across a dangerous world filled with colorful characters. The game heavily focuses on the constant threat presented by the always-following beast. Sleep will be limited, supplies will need to be gathered and used sparingly, and along the way, expect to meet a plethora of really strange NPC's.

Your path is your own

Every adventure begins with a randomly generated map for you to traverse through. Pick which spots you want to visit and learn what may await behind each icon!

Fight, scavenge, and keep moving

A variety of enemies stand in your path, just as you have a variety of classes to choose from. Pick your fighting style and use it to push forward, picking up food, drinks, and powerups along the way!

Make tough decisions

Every good adventure has some roadblocks- some a little dumber than others...

Meet total weirdos

There's no shortage of odd characters to meet... NPC's can be found in abundance. Your own character gets a personality of your choosing! From Hero to Vigilante, Wild Card to Menace, there's hundreds of unique lines to find.

Vending Machine

vending machine



And hey buddy... we got a LOT more vending machines where that came from.

item.title: RTS Football
item.description:
About This Game

RTS Football is a video game that blends the challenge of the real-time strategy (RTS) genre with American football. Taking place in a futuristic world where robots have taken the field in an epic battle for supremacy, and of course, touchdowns, RTS Football offers all the classic features of a 2D RTS game, including but not limited to resource management, unit management, and unit creation. But with a twist: players command a team of of robots that each serve a role in different positions on the field, the objective being to outmaneuver the opposing team in order to score and not turn the ball over.

item.title: Survive In Strange World
item.description:
About This Game

A magical power called The Spark reappears with you in this world. The Spark protects human survival, but it is also coveted by various evil forces. Can you survive under their overwhelming attacks?

Equip yourself with powerful weapons and mechs, build your own shelter, accommodate refugees and partners, build turrets and city walls. Hone your combat skills, or rely on the power of partners to resist evil together, Protect the spark.

Welcome to the strange world. In the end, you will face your ultimate fate. No matter what happened in the past, you want to live in the future.

Game features:

  • A comprehensive beginner's tutorial
  • Randomly generate and combine over 20 types of enemies. Deal with enemies flexibly with different skills and attributes.
  • More than 60 different weapons, mechs, and enhancements, choose the combat style that suits you.
  • You can play game as bullet shooting, action games, or tower defense games according to your own preferences. Survival is justice.
  • Build the base and balance development and survival. Keep your food and sanity abundant.
  • You can rely on the power of your partners or fight alone (although this can be extremely difficult)

item.title: Sword of the King - The Classic of Mountains and Seas
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to the world of "Swordsmanship Classic of Mountains and Seas"! In this game, you will experience the unique "Sword" flight play, allowing you to freely soar through the world of books. Facing various enemies, you need to skillfully avoid their attacks while counterattacking with your sword.


In the "Swordsmanship Classic of Mountains and Seas", players will play as a brave swordsman, exploring the mysterious world of mountains and seas. You can choose different sword techniques to engage in fierce battles with enemies. Each sword has its unique characteristics and skills, allowing you to unleash powerful forces in battle.


By unlocking new books, you can acquire more skills and equipment to enhance your strength.



In the "Swordsmanship Classic of Mountains and Seas", the flight play is one of its main features. Players can freely traverse various areas by flying on their swords, seeking new challenges and adventures. Enemies' bouncing attacks will test your reaction and skills, keeping you on your guard at all times.




Overall, "Swordsmanship Classic of Mountains and Seas" is a game full of challenges and exploration. Here, you will experience unique flight play, fierce battles, and rich exploration elements. Come join the game and embark on your adventure through the mountains and seas!

item.title: Run and Retry
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to RUN & RETRY. In this nervous FPS, you must progress speeding to beat timer.
You will have a great mobility, with many movements mecanics allowing rapid progress.
You can run fast, but warning, do not confuse speed with haste.
Jump is very important to progress, double jump is a good asset, but with bad timing, it's death.
When you arrive with full speed, a good slide can save you !
Wall run is a speedy mecanic, allowing to take verticality.
Bomb is as a rocket jump, but you can place it with precision to maximise speed.
You can take verticality or to move forward.
Teleport help you in many difficults situations, when you miss a platform, a telport is welcome.
You also can use it to progress with more speed or reach to a higher point.
Levels are buiding to miximise speed and leave the choice to player,he can use different abilities to progress, or different paths.
This important element is to do with the best timer.

Choose Your Gameplay But Never Forget the Speed !

item.title: Dynasty
item.description:
About This Game

Your king father is dead, and you are now alone. A day ago he stood strong and proud. The royal advisors found cause and means to open your king father's chest to voice their dissent against his rule. "Trust no one," were his dying words. You do not know why they killed him, or how they killed him, but there is no denying that they succeeded. The mandate of heaven falls to you. You must prolong the Dynasty.

Dynasty is a social deduction roguelike in which you must rule your kingdom through your advisors, who you are unsure whether you can trust. Your advisors hold the keys to power. You must please them enough to keep them loyal and grant them the power to administrate your kingdom. But beware-- the more power you grant them, the more they may use that power against you. You must survive 30 turns without being assassinated. If you have not been assassinated by your advisors by turn 30, you win.

Features:

  • Play a social deduction roguelike in which you must avoid assassination by your advisors as you administer your kingdom.
  • 200 programs
  • 30 turns
  • 15 abilities
  • 6 advisors
  • 1 monarch

There are six primary advisors:

  • Seneschal Belmin: The majordomo of your palace. Through him you can curry the loyalty of your other advisors. He can help you expand your palace and staff, and with enough power can learn the true loyalty of your other advisors.
  • Captain Niri: The Captain of your Crownguard. She will help you discover and foil assassination plots. If you suspect another advisor of plotting against you, you can have her arrest them, to be replaced by another hopefully more loyal second.
  • Treasurer Chaddik: Of the Royal Treasury. He safeguards your income and manages your coffers and expenses. Through him you can purchase the loyalty of other advisors.
  • Magistrate Elenda: Of the Ministry of the Commons. She represents the will of your subjects. Without her resourceful solutions to the problems your kingdom faces, there would surely be unrest and revolts.
  • Unitary Alesanvi: The highest religious officiant. The piety of other advisors only offers her more power, though she tells you that her power comes only from the heavens.
  • General Higan: The commander of the Royal Army. Through his military might you can command fear and obedience. Beware that you do not turn your kingdom into a military dictatorship.
